result.arabic_text: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
result.translation: 196. Anu Sin Yallittek mannal meesitaa? Diggah Yi dacayrii kee Yi catoh awlayti Yallay Qhuraan kitab yol oobise kinnik, usuk isi naqoosak meqe mara cataah dacrisah addunyaay akeeral.
